metadata.title: CVE-2016-4855 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ADOdb versions prior to 5.20.6 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: libphp-adodb package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.20.6-1').
